intro: Palicourea latifolia, commonly known as broadleaf palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. The plant is characterized by its broad, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It often grows as an understory plant in humid, shaded forest environments. Palicourea latifolia is sometimes used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
